Articles.Content:
Alot if my craft have some very unimaginative and bland names, and are only named after their purpose. I could always solve this problem by spending 10 minutes thinking of a good name, but who has that kind of time when you have to be carrying out some crazy mission. As a new member of the forum to make my new thread dedicated to this purpose, re-naming peoples' lame craft names . I sure other people have the same problem so feel free to post your own ships that need a name, remember to give name suggestions and improvements.

I's like to start out with one of the first crafts I decided to make look very neat and tidy with the new B9 Aerospace. However, it's just blandly dubbed "Kethane Tanker MK III" and needs a better name.

What do you think it should be named? Got any improvement suggestions?

Remember feel free to post your own ships!
